name: Lost and Found (Sebastien Lagos-fuentes)
description:
This is a game made in a weekend for a game jam, it's a really straightforward game with a comedic angle to it. hope you enjoy it and thanks for checking it out!

Control Scheme:.

-Hold left mouse button to pick up item.

-Let go of left mouse to drop the item.

Team: 

Game Designer: Sebastien Lagos-Fuentes

Scripter: Dimitri Sky

Artist: Niko King
